item.title: Classic TV Shows
item.description: Johnny Ball Johnny Ball was an absolute legend, I grew up watching all of his shows; Think of a Number (6 series, 6 editions each) Think Again (5 series, 5/6 editions each) Think!Backwards (5 editions) Think! This Way (5 editions) Think It … Do It (2 series, 6 editions each) Knowhow (3 series, 6 editions each) Johnny Ball Reveals All (5 series, 5-7 editions each) I don’t understand why we still don’t have educational programs like this on TV today …
item.content:encoded:
Johnny Ball

Johnny Ball was an absolute legend, I grew up watching all of his shows;

  • Think of a Number (6 series, 6 editions each)
  • Think Again (5 series, 5/6 editions each)
  • Think!Backwards (5 editions)
  • Think! This Way (5 editions)
  • Think It … Do It (2 series, 6 editions each)
  • Knowhow (3 series, 6 editions each)
  • Johnny Ball Reveals All (5 series, 5-7 editions each)

I don’t understand why we still don’t have educational programs like this on TV today …

Think Of A Number (1984) - Johnny Ball

Think of a Number - Light - Johnny Ball

Think Again titles & credits - Johnny Ball - BBC 1983

‘Think It..Do It’ - On The Set Of SUPERMAN IV

Johnny Ball Reveals All, Full Intro
